verses.1: In the LORD I take refuge. How then can you say to me: "Flee like a bird to your mountain.
verses.2: For look, the wicked bend their bows; they set their arrows against the strings to shoot from the shadows at the upright in heart.
verses.3: When the foundations are being destroyed, what can the righteous do?"
verses.4: The LORD is in his holy temple; the LORD is on his heavenly throne. He observes the sons of men; his eyes examine them.
verses.5: The LORD examines the righteous, but the wicked and those who love violence his soul hates.
verses.6: On the wicked he will rain fiery coals and burning sulfur; a scorching wind will be their lot.
verses.7: For the LORD is righteous, he loves justice; upright men will see his face.
